name: Atmoph
0:
”Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to turn off.”
”Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to change the view.”
”Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to a view that's dark.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: atmoph window
des:
This is a voice-control skill for Atmoph Window. In order to use this skill, you'll need to link account and complete the integration settings on Atmoph Window. If you have any questions, feel free to email us at contact@atmoph.com.

Turning the window on/off

"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to turn on"
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to turn off"

Changing the view

"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to show another view"
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to show a view of France"
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to show a view that's dark"

Calendar

"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to show me the schedule this month"
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window what're my plans today"
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to hide the calendar"

Clock

"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to show me the clock:
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to hide the clock:

Weather

"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to show me the weather"
"Alexa, ask Atmoph Window to hide the weather"
